# [0.1.0](https://github.com/Pearson-Higher-Ed/compounds/compare/02b602f...v0.1.0) (2016-06-20)


### Bug Fixes

* Handle IE override of button input type. ([a0000a2](https://github.com/Pearson-Higher-Ed/compounds/commit/a0000a2))
